org.gridgain.client
Interface GridClientData

public interface GridClientData

A data projection of grid client. Contains various methods for cache operations ant metrics retrieval.

Wiki & Forum:

Method Detail

cacheName

String cacheName()
Gets name of the remote cache.

Returns:
Name of the remote cache.

pinNodes

GridClientData pinNodes(GridClientNode node,
                        GridClientNode... nodes)
                        throws GridClientException
Gets client data which will only contact specified remote grid node. By default, remote node is determined based on GridClientDataAffinity provided - this method allows to override default behavior and use only specified server for all cache operations.

Use this method when there are other than key-affinity reasons why a certain node should be contacted.

Throws:
GridClientException - If resulting projection is empty.
Parameters:
node - Node to be contacted.
nodes - Optional additional nodes.
Returns:
Client data which will only contact server with given node ID.

pinnedNodes

Collection<GridClientNode> pinnedNodes()
Gets pinned node or null if no node was pinned.

Returns:
Pinned node.

cas

<K,V> boolean cas(K key,
                  V val1,
                  V val2)
            throws GridClientException
Sets entry value to val1 if current value is val2.

If val1 is null and val2 is equal to current value, entry is removed from cache.

If val2 is null, entry is created if it doesn't exist.

If both val1 and val2 are null, entry is removed.

Throws:
GridClientException - In case of error.
Parameters:
key - Key.
val1 - Value to set.
val2 - Check value.
Returns:
Whether value of entry was changed.

casAsync

<K,V> GridClientFuture<Boolean> casAsync(K key,
                                         V val1,
                                         V val2)
                                   throws GridServerUnreachableException,
                                          GridClientClosedException
Asynchronously sets entry value to val1 if current value is val2.

If val1 is null and val2 is equal to current value, entry is removed from cache.

If val2 is null, entry is created if it doesn't exist.

If both val1 and val2 are null, entry is removed.

Throws:
GridServerUnreachableException - If none of the servers can be reached.
GridClientClosedException - If client was closed manually.
Parameters:
key - Key.
val1 - Value to set.
val2 - Check value.
Returns:
Future.

affinity

<K> UUID affinity(K key)
              throws GridClientException
Gets affinity node ID for provided key. This method will return null if no affinity was configured for the given cache or there are no nodes in topology with cache enabled.

Throws:
GridClientException - In case of error.
Parameters:
key - Key.
Returns:
Node ID.
